adDetails: dog sitter (my home) Hi ! I am an experienced dog sitter. And I've had many dogs in the past as well- i have one right now too. A very sweet and friendly dog. If you need someone to watch your dog when you're out of town or date night i am available from monday to sunday. I have a large house and backyard where your dogs will have fun running! I will keep you updated and send you pictures of your dog when they are with me. I am an honest and responsible person. If you have some question please don't hesitate to contact me. I charge $15/daybig or small dogs.(daytime) and $25 a night/sleep over. Dog food (wet/dry) & treats included! References available!
